segments.text: No thanks . We just need our check . Have you seen the waitress ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , the service hasn't been the best . Is that our waitress over there ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'll walk over and get the bill , since I don't think the waitress is coming over here any time soon .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Good idea . Just bring it back and we'll figure it out together .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How much do you think we should leave for a tip ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: My first inclination is to leave nothing for a tip .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I agree , but we don't really know the whole story . There may have been problems in the kitchen beyond her control .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Let's leave 10 % , so that we at least leave something for the service .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I agree . We will leave $ 3.60 for the tip .
segments.speaker: S2
